name: Laruaville 14
description:
Touch the Oriental Wisdom from the ancient sage himself and build him a town!
!!!!We’ve decided to significantly refresh this series of games, so the game mechanics of this game has lots of changes, including a power-up system and some new mechanics which you’ve never seen in our games before.
As usual, there’s also some bonus games: Blocks, Mahjongs, Spot the difference and Hidden Object scenes. And you can replay your favorite levels!
And, of course, there's a town to build!
